QuestData.Title: Return to Aviana
QuestData.Description: $n, you've done all you can here. This whole cavern is about to collapse in on itself!$B$BI'll gather up the last of our feathered steeds and ensure that the flamegate is sealed behind me.$B$BYou should go on ahead and let Aviana know that this abominable hatchery is no more!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Aviana at the Shrine of Aviana in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Aviana at the Shrine of Aviana in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: <Aviana's face is immobile as you tell her about what happened within the hatchery.>$B$BThey stole my eggs, $c. They took them to that foul place. Corrupted them.$B$BMy children stolen, tormented, killed in a vat of flame... Yes, we will make Twilight's Hammer pay.$B$BBut I confess, part of me wants to fly up and simply watch this whole... world... burn.
